About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a final year student pursing a B.Sc In Computer Science at The University of Technology, Jamaica

Career Statement: To obtain a position that will put me to the challenge and to learn additional stuff to broaden my expertise, so I may be of greater value within my field.

Live a life that will help others spiritually, intellectually, physically, financially and relationally. Live a life that serves as an example of what an exceptional life can look like.
